h1.span: Application for Free & Reduced Meals (COVID19 pandemic)

span.span: Hello, Blue Jays. If your household situation has recently changed due to the COVID19 pandemic, please feel free to apply or reapply for Free & Reduced Meals through the National School Lunch Program.
The application can be found here:
For safety, you can mail it back to the district or drop it off in the lobby of either building.
FOR FASTEST CONSIDERATION AND APPROVAL, FILL OUT THE APPLICATION COMPLETELY, SCAN OR TAKE A PHOTO OF IT AND EMAIL IT TO ryan.rotuna@jmlocal.com.

div.script: stLight.options({ publisher: "ddb4fa0a-d941-46b8-b9b6-a5d72fd54589", doNotHash: false, doNotCopy: false, hashAddressBar: true });
